General.Name: Nanfang Black Sesame Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanfang Black Sesame Group Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells black sesame health products in China. It offers elderly high-calcium black sesame milk, black sesame pastes brewing products, black sesame beverage products, baking, candy, black sesame balls, sesame cakes, and other products. The company was formerly known as Guangxi Nanfang Foodstuff Group Stock Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nanfang Black Sesame Group Co., Ltd. in April 2012. Nanfang Black Sesame Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Nanning, China.
